content: Alright, let me explain it to you one more time!

"Synthesis" of Luca means taking existing Luca clusters and
<color=#38b6c5>clicking "Synthesize"</color>
to form a complete Luca.

Eh? Hold on! I didn't come up with this name myself,
It's the "definition" given to me in your legends.
I think it means something like a strange but cute little creature.

Just like different seeds sprout different buds,
different "Lucas" also "grow" into
world bubbles with unique ecosystems and distinct environments.

So, shall we wake up now,
And return to the connected real world?

For "Construction", you can <color=#38b6c5>click</color> on these fitted Luca,
<color=#38b6c5>construct</color> different ecological environment combinations,
then <color=#38b6c5>"Connect"</color> to change the real world bubble.
I want to hear the instructions again.

<color=#695c3a>I wasn't just yanked here from my sleep!</color>
(Suddenly angry)

Every world bubble depends on
a type of energy called "Luca".

And there's the glowing, 
sparkling <color=#8AAB4B>"Sea of Fireflies"</color>!
Everything I've seen in my dreams can be built here!

So, shall we wake up first,
And return to the connected real world?

Or perhaps, you'd rather
wake up first and return to the connected real world?

Nice to see you again!
How would you like to connect with Luca this time?

Since this is your first time,
let me explain everything in detail.
Because vitality constantly flows and merges between Luca clusters, different ecosystems form only when they combine into complete Luca.

However, since Luca is quite active,
there's a chance you might get
incomplete Luca clusters!
In the bubble worlds I've visited in my dreams, I've seen the magical <color=#8AAB4B>"Sparkly Foam Beach"</color>!

However, since Luca is very active,
there's a chance you might get
incomplete Luca clusters!
I just woke up, so my powers are still a bit weak, but I can still use Luca to create some special scenery in your bubble world!

However, since Luca is quite active,
there's a chance you might get
an incomplete Luca cluster!

Oh right! Since you connected to the World Bubble
and have been living here so actively,
I found some Luca clusters from the World Bubble here!

I can help you <color=#38b6c5>"Fit"</color> Luca fragments into complete Lucas,
Or <color=#38b6c5>"Construct"</color> different Luca combinations,
To carve out unique landscapes in your world bubble!

Since this is your first time,
let me explain everything in detail.

Oh? Oh! What kind of response is this!
Are future Linkers really this cold? Oh my...
Waking up someone who's sleeping is... wait, no, this is all in a dream.

Volcanoes glowing like neon lights,
beaches made of jewel-like sand,
skies painted with clouds of every hue,
and rivers where peculiar water plants grow...

Do you see the world behind me?
This is the core that powers every world bubble—
The <color=#8AAB4B><ruby:Heart of Luca>Heart of Luca</ruby></color>.

Neon-like volcanoes, gem-shaped beaches,
Skies painted with clouds of every hue,
And rivers where unique aquatic plants grow...

Due to the effects of turbulence,
"Luca" has dispersed into fragments of "Luca Clusters."
Go forth and seek those disconnected world bubbles!
Because vitality constantly flows and merges between clusters of Luca, different ecosystems form when they combine into complete Luca.
So, shall we connect to Luca?

Aha! It must be you!
The one who connected the tiny world bubbles!
In the world bubbles I've visited in my dreams, I've seen the fairy-like <color=#8AAB4B>"Sparkly Foam Beach"</color>!

That's right! This is the Luca cluster!
It's the energy that can form world bubbles and ecosystems!
And I am Archiboo from the dream world!

That's right! This is Luca Cluster!
It's the energy that can form world bubble ecosystems!
Wait... why do we need to connect?

I can't believe this unremarkable-looking world bubble
contains <color=#38b6c5>850</color> Luca!
Delicious! This place must be really special.

Every world bubble depends on
a type of energy called "Luca".

Alright then, it's time to wake up from this dream!
As long as you have Luca Clusters with you,
you can return here through dreaming anytime.

What the heck!
So you just dragged me here without knowing anything!
And I was sleeping too! I'm so mad!

"Synthesis" of Luca means taking existing Luca clusters,
<color=#38b6c5>clicking "Synthesize"</color>
to form a complete Luca.
It's pretty good as it is.

So bright!
I can sense the radiance of "Luca" from you!
So, did you bring Luca with you?

As long as you have Luca Clusters with you,
you can return through dreamwalking anytime.

You could say it was originally part of this world,
So once we clear away the obstacles,
The connection can be restored.

Alright then, it's time to wake up from this dream!
As long as you have Luca Clusters with you,
you can always return here through dreaming.
Return to where you woke up.

tags. Let me do that now:

<translated_text>Alright then, it's time to wake up from this dream!
As long as you have Luca Crystals with you,
you can return here through dreaming anytime.

What the heck!
So you dragged me here without knowing anything at all!

Back to the point! Let's get to the point!
Earlier, you were able to connect to the nearby world bubbles
because they were already on this Astralink.

However, most of the world bubbles in this universe
have lost contact due to the influence of turbulent flows,
and "Luca" has also dispersed into fragments of "Luca clusters".

As for "Construction", you can <color=#38b6c5>click</color> on these fitted Luca,
<color=#38b6c5>construct</color> different combinations of ecosystems,
then click <color=#38b6c5>"Connect"</color> to change the real world bubble.

Take in the sights of this connected world.
If you wish to return,
come find me again.

What the heck!
So you dragged me here without knowing anything at all!
You don't have any Luca available for construction yet. Hurry up and go to "Fitting"!

I can help you <color=#38b6c5>"synthesize"</color> Luca fragments into complete Luca,
or <color=#38b6c5>"construct"</color> different Luca combinations,
to craft unique scenery in your world bubble!

That's right! This is Luca Energy!
It's the energy that can form world bubble ecosystems!
And I am Archiboo from the dream world!
Let's give the earth some fresh inspiration!

Oh dear! Don't worry about it.
You can put "Luca" away for now,
and come find me again when inspiration strikes!

But this trial-and-error method won't work
when connecting to other world bubbles!
Let Archiboo show you the real way to connect worlds!
Let's paint the sky with some new colors.

Oh? Oh! What kind of response is this!
Are future Connectors really this cold-hearted? Oh...
Waking up someone who's sleeping is... wait, no, this is all in a dream.
Return to where you woke up.

"Synthesis" of Luca means taking existing Luca clusters and
<color=#38b6c5>clicking "Synthesize"</color>
to form a complete Luca.
Because vitality constantly flows and merges between Luca clusters, different ecosystems form only when they combine into complete Luca.

Oh right, since you connected to the World Bubble
and have been living here so actively,
I found some Luca clusters from the World Bubble here!

...Babe? ...Babe-y babe babe?
Are we that close already?

And as the one who connects,
I can now use Luca's energy
to reshape the world just as I desire!
Let's give Mother Earth some fresh inspiration!

However, most of the world bubbles in this world
have lost contact due to turbulent flows,
and "Luca" has dispersed into fragments of "Luca clusters".

The <color=#8AAB4B>Luca Cluster</color> is right there on those disconnected world bubbles.
Due to its overflowing vitality,
its <color=#8AAB4B>radiant glow</color> makes it quite noticeable.

However, I just woke up and my powers are still a bit weak,
but I can still use Luca to create some special
scenery in your bubble world!

For "Construction", you can <color=#38b6c5>click</color> on these fitted Luca,
<color=#38b6c5>Build</color> different ecological environment combinations,
Then <color=#38b6c5>"Connect"</color> to change the real world bubble.

What you found while fishing in the Ordered World
is a "Luca Cluster"!
Full of vitality, it drew you to this place.

Find "Luca" from other world bubbles and bring them here,
By connecting different world bubbles,
we can share the entire Sky River's ecosystem!
Return to where you woke up.

So dazzling!
I can sense the radiance of "Luca" from you!
So, did you bring Luca with you?
It's pretty good as it is.
Return to where you woke up.

Alright,
as long as you have Luca Clusters,
you can return through dreaming at any time.

Because of your connection to the world, I—
Archiboo, the "spirit" connecting all world bubbles—
Was able to meet you!

That's where you come in!
You'll need to visit those disconnected worlds and search around!
In your own special way. (winks)

Oh, don't worry!
You can put "Luca" away for now,
and come back to me when inspiration strikes.

No problem! Different "Luca" will have different effects.
Just bring your Luca to me,
and I can make it happen for you!

And there's the flowing phosphorescence,
the sparkling <color=#8AAB4B>"Firefly Waves"</color>!
Everything I've seen in my dreams, I can create it all!

Find other "Luca" from different world bubbles and bring them here,
By connecting different world bubbles,
we can share the entire Sky River's ecosystem!

Ah! I'm Archiboo, who connects dream worlds together!
The Luca within you
has awakened the power of connection.

Yes, because of this connection, I'm—
I'm Archiboo, the "spirit" who connects different world bubbles.
That's how I came to meet you!

Just like how different seeds sprout different buds,
different "Lucas" will also "grow"
into world bubbles with unique ecosystems and environments.
Let's paint the sky with some new colors.

Take your time to enjoy this connected world.
If you wish to return,
come find me again.

No problem! Different "Luca" will have different effects.
Just bring your Luca to me,
and I can make it happen for you!

As long as you have Luca Clusters with you,
you can always return through dreaming.

Ah! I'm Archiboo, who connects the world bubbles in dreams.
The Luca cluster you have,
It triggered the power of connection.

Do you see the world behind me?
This is the core that powers every world bubble—
The <color=#8AAB4B><ruby:Heart of All>Heart of Luca</ruby></color>.

And as the one who connects,
I can now use Luca's energy
to reshape the world however I want!

Alright,
As long as you have Luca Clusters with you,
You can return through dream-diving anytime.

Do you see the world behind me?
This is the core that powers every world bubble—
The <color=#8AAB4B><ruby:Heart of Luca>Heart of Luca</ruby></color>.

I can help you <color=#38b6c5>"synthesize"</color> Luca fragments into complete Luca,
or <color=#38b6c5>"construct"</color> different Luca combinations,
to craft unique scenery in your world bubble!
